title: Crucial (song)
text: "Crucial" is <a href="New%20Edition">New Edition</a>'s fourth single from the "<a href="Heart%20Break">Heart Break</a>" album. The single featured production from <a href="Jellybean%20Johnson">Jellybean Johnson</a>, <a href="Spencer%20Bernard">Spencer Bernard</a>, and <a href="Jimmy%20Jam%20and%20Terry%20Lewis">Jimmy Jam and Terry Lewis</a>. "Crucial" hit No. 4 on the "Billboard" <a href="Hot%20R%26amp%3BB/Hip-Hop%20Songs">R&B singles chart</a>. It was featured on the "<a href="License%20to%20Drive">License to Drive</a>" soundtrack.
